titleStmt.title: Sweete thovghtes of Iesvs and Marie, or, Meditations for all the feasts of ovr B. Saviovr and his B. Mother togeither with Meditations for all the Sundayes of the yeare and our Sauiovrs Passion : for the vse of the daughters of Sion : diuided into tvvo partes / by Thomas Carre ...
titleStmt.author: Carre, Thomas, 1599-1674.

notesStmt.note: Second part has special t.p.: Meditations for all the Svndayes in the yeare.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
